trans-unit.source: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表在頁首或頁尾關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter 提供頁首和頁尾資訊<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>顯示預覽列印模式時。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的工作流程設計工具，使用者可以設定頁首和頁尾上**頁首/頁尾**索引標籤上**版面** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner with which the
trans-unit.target: SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner，透過它

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is a header; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is a footer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>為頁首;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>為頁尾。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得套用頁首或頁尾的根目錄設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>的<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>套用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程設計介面上的頁首或頁尾週框矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>包圍<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>工作流程設計介面上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定關聯於頁首或頁尾的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與頁首或頁尾關聯之影像的週框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image*> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>定義的界限<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image*>聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image*>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> when the elements it contains are repositioned by the user.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>它所包含的項目由使用者重新定位。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Draws the header or footer associated with the workflow root designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 繪製頁首或頁尾在設計介面上的工作流程根目錄設計工具相關聯。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text description associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定關聯於頁首或頁尾的文字描述。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the text description associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含相關聯的文字描述<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the text associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與頁首或頁尾關聯之文字的周框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text*> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>定義的界限<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text*>聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text*>
